name: Cozy Autumn Bug Hunt
description:
Made with love in 14 days for
COZY AUTUMN GAME JAM 2022

Programming & Art by Raaaaaandy

Music & SFX by Miguel.Music

Color Palette: Paradise 30

"The goal of this jam is to be fun and relaxing. If you're stressed during this game jam then you're missing the point."

Don't tell me how to live my life. -Raaaaaandy
